reviews.text: The coffee is really good here!
Great food great people just stopped around for mechanic work this gem was only one around

The owner is outside. The food is soooooo amazing. I can’t even explain it. I travel from Staten Island just to have this delectable meal. Not only is the food amazing , but they serve with a smile. Can’t recommend enough
The most delicious sandwich you will ever have. The bread, meat and all ingredients so fresh and top quality.  The way they put it together is magic! La Madrina so good.

Just tried the new cold cut lineup at Café Italia and it seriously hits Super fresh and packed with flavor you can tell they’re not cutting corners.

The mozzarella is soft, creamy, and tastes like it was made that morning the Ciao salami has a nice kick without being too spicy, and the sopressata? Bold rich and full of flavor.

Really feeling the coppa dolce too sweet, tender, and melts in your mouth. And the prosciutto di Parma is next level thin, salty, buttery just classic Italian done right.

I come here for the sandwiches and cappuccino. The cappuccino is delicious and comforting...makes you close your eyes and smile as you enjoy it. The sandwiches are delicious and there is a good variety too. You can also customize. The place is clean, has chill music, and the best staff. I like that there are tables to sit and enjoy your meal. I also like that they have freshly squeezed natural orange juice. It has authentic Italian ingredients and the Biscotti tastes like it was made by Nonna. Definitely recommend.
All I can say is quality from the food to the bread to the coffee and the staff two thumbs up hands-down the best Cafe Italia you’re gonna find in the five boroughs.
Delicious coffee and food prep with the best ingredients.
The place was clean, the food can’t be beaten, such a home cooked flavor. And the service is covered with a beautiful looking staff , ready to serve you
The food is always fresh and appetizing. Fresh bread every morning, fresh coffee, fresh everything. And everything I've had has been on point. 10/10
Amazing coffee! had the best latte here they use authentic Italian coffee and their sandwiches are delicious! Love this place for breakfast & lunch!
Fresh and Delish !
Café Italia never disappoints! La Madrina is one of my favorite sandwiches - so flavorful and perfectly made. And their matcha? Absolutely perfect! Highly recommend!!!!
Spotless place . The hero would of been great but they gave me really stale bread!!!!!  What a shame. Was real hopeful for something good and to not have to drive to arthur ave
The best in Hunts Point !

Very delicious and very well thought out menu. If you are in Hunts Point and you are craving a sandwich, this is your spot. Staff is attentive, prices are very reasonable and the food itself is quality. They are very accommodating and the dine in area is very peaceful. Come here!!
Friendly service and amazing sandwiches. Im very happy a place like this is in the area.

Working for the day at Tiffany and Randall Avenue and somebody said there's a place Italian down the street so I said to myself.
Self let me get a sandwich and it was excellent
great heros , steak special 10/10
Service and food was incredible. The Benny blanco and godfather are must haves
Fantastic food, friendly service , long overdue for this neighborhood. So happy to have this cafe locally.

Customer service is grate & friendly
Oh if you are in a rush go to McD.
And get fast food
The best cappaccino  and I fell in love with the avocado tost
